leftBlock.title: Convert PNR to understandable form for the passenger
leftBlock.description: Paste the PNR from any GDS, we will convert it into a readable form for the passenger. Convert options in seconds. Save your time.
examples: Oct 15, 10:10 - 12:00, London (Gatwick) - Vancouver, TS 275, Air Transat
Oct 15, 13:35 - 14:35, Vancouver - Seattle (Tacoma), AC 8097, Air Canada
Oct 17, 17:00 - 17:53, Seattle (Tacoma) - Portland, AS 2254, Alaska Airlines
Oct 17, 6:45 pm - 12:10 pm, Portland-London (Heathrow), AA 7007, American Airlines
